content.question: Which of the following is a possible limitation of fiscal policy?

choices.label: Its outcome could be delayed because of implementation lags.
It is more effective during inflationary periods than during recessionary periods.
It is less effective in reducing the natural rate of unemployment than monetary policy.
It does not affect discouraged workers.

content.answer: Its outcome could be delayed because of implementation lags.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
